eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
R_{uu} &=& - \sum_{\alpha=2}^p [ u_\alpha'' + (u_\alpha')^2 - 2u_\alpha' u_0']
 - k[ B'' + (B')^2 - 2 B' u_0'], \nonumber\\
R_{vv} &=& 4 e^{-4u_0 +4 u_1} \Big[ u_1'' + u_1'(-2u_0' +2u_1'
 + \sum_{\alpha=2}^p u_\alpha' + k B' )\Big], \nonumber\\
R_{uv} &=& 2 e^{-2u_0 +2 u_1} \Big[ u_1'' + u_1'(-2u_0' +2u_1'
 + \sum_{\alpha=2}^p u_\alpha' + k B' )\Big], \nonumber\\
R_{\alpha\beta} &=& -2 e^{2(-2u_0 +u_1+ u_\alpha)} \Big[ u_\alpha'' + u_\alpha'( -2 u_0'
 +2u_1' + \sum_{\gamma=2}^p u_\gamma' + k B') \Big]\delta_{\alpha\beta}, \nonumber\\
R_{ab} &=& -2 e^{2(-2u_0+u_1+B)}\Big[ B'' + B'( -2u_0' + 2u_1'
 + \sum_{\alpha=2}^p u_\alpha' +k B')\Big]\bar g_{ab} + \sigma (k-1)\bar g_{ab},
\label{ricci}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& \left( \sum_{A} \frac{D-2q_A-4}{4(D-2)} c_A E_A
+ c_1 -\frac{1}{k-1}\sum_{\alpha=1}^p c_\alpha\right) \left( \sum_{A} \frac{c_A E_A}{4}
 + c_1+\frac{1}{k-1}\sum_{\alpha=1}^p c_\alpha \right) \nonumber\\
&& + \; \sum_{\alpha=2}^p \left( \sum_{A} \frac{\delta_{A}^{(\alpha)}}{4(D-2)} c_A E_A
 + c_\alpha \right)^2 + k \left( \sum_{A} \frac{q_A+1}{4(D-2)} c_A E_A
 + \frac{1}{k-1}\sum_{\alpha=1}^p c_\alpha\right)^2 \nonumber\\
&& + \; \frac{1}{2} \left( \sum_{A} \frac{\epsilon_A a_A}{4} c_A E_A - c_\phi \right)^2
 - \sum_{A} \frac{c_A}{4} E_A' - k(k-1) \beta^2 =0.
\label{sint}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
2u_0 &=& kg(u) - \sum_{A} \frac{D-2q_A-4}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(u-u_A)
 - c_0 u + c_0', \nonumber\\
u_\alpha &=& - \sum_{A} \frac{\delta_{A}^{(\alpha)}}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(u-u_A)
 - \tilde c_\alpha u + c_\alpha', \hspace{3 mm} (\alpha=1,\cdots, p), \nonumber\\
B &=& g(u) + \sum_{A} \frac{q_A+1}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(u-u_A)
 + c_b u +c_b', \nonumber\\
\phi &=& \sum_{A} \frac{(D-2)\epsilon_A a_A}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(u-u_A)
 + \tilde c_\phi u + c_\phi',
\label{res3}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds_{N2}^2 &=& [\cosh\tilde c (u-u_2)]^{1/3}
 \Bigg[ -2 e^{7g(u)+2c u} [\cosh\tilde c (u-u_2)]^{-1/2} dudv \nonumber\\
&& +\; [\cosh\tilde c (u-u_2)]^{-1} \{-2 e^{4c u} dv^2
 + e^{-2 c u}(dy_2^2 +dy_3^2)\}
 + e^{2g(u)+2c'}d\Sigma_{7,\sigma}^2 \Bigg], \nonumber\\
&& \tilde c^2 + 12 c^2 = 84 \beta^2, \nonumber\\
ds_{N5}^2 &=& [\cosh\tilde c (u-u_2)]^{2/3}
 \Bigg[ -2 e^{4g(u)+5c u} [\cosh\tilde c (u-u_2)]^{-1/2} dudv \nonumber\\
&& \hspace{-5 mm} + \; [\cosh\tilde c (u-u_2)]^{-1} \{-2 e^{10c u} dv^2
+ e^{-2 c u}(dy_2^2 +\cdots + dy_6^2)\}+ e^{2g(u)+2c'}d\Sigma_{4,\sigma}^2 \Bigg],
\nonumber\\
&& \tilde c^2 + 60 c^2 = 24 \beta^2,
\
